title: nn_learning_snapshot
description: a training record for a neural network that takes a snapshot of progress

id.description: a uuid, as the unique identifier for this snapshot

name.description: maybe give each snapshot a name? idk.

nn_class.description: which neural network class are you using?

operation.description: what is the name of the operation being taught to the neural network

weight_modification_functions.description: for each weight, what is the modification function

weight_initialization_functions.description: for each weight, what is the modification function

starting_weights.description: keep track of where the weight values started

learning_history.description: a collection of each of the learning records, one for each training iteration
